title: New York City’s First Cannabis Boss Wants to Combat ‘Cannaphobia’
description: Dasheeda Dawson, a native New Yorker, returns home to direct the effort to build cannabis businesses and to absorb the illegal market into the new legitimate one.
dc:creator: Ashley Southall
media:credit: Nate Palmer for The New York Times
media:description: Dasheeda Dawson grew up in Brooklyn at the height of the war on drugs.
